DOC.brief_summary: A study LEO 32731 treatment psoriasis vulgaris
DOC.brief_title: LEO 32731 Treatment Moderate Severe Psoriasis Vulgaris
DOC.detailed_description: This investigation efficacy LEO 32731 30 mg compare placebo 16 week oral treatment psoriasis vulgaris
DOC.criteria: Signed date informed consent Aged 18 year 65 . Males females nonchildbearing potential . Clinical diagnosis psoriasis vulgaris without psoriatic arthritis Have moderate severe psoriasis vulgaris Candidates systemic antipsoriatic treatment and/or phototherapy Subjects therapy resistant psoriasis Previously expose apremilast Systemic treatment biological therapy , whether market , possible effect psoriasis vulgaris Systemic treatment therapy ( biologics ) possible effect psoriasis vulgaris
